refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Quote (') is used for conjugate transpose (Hermitian conjugation) of matrix.
Quote (.') is used for non-conjugate transpose of matrix.
Simple (') or double (") quotes are also used to define character strings. (Character strings are defined between two quotes). A quote within a character string is denoted by two quotes.

refsection.title: Examples
refsection.programlisting: [1+%i, 2]' [1+%i, 2].' x='This is a character string' x="This is another character string" 'He said:''Good''' 'He said:""Very Good""'
